alert.note: Alert for Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 06 at 8:44PM AKST until November 08 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MONDAY TO NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula. * WHEN...From 3 AM Monday to noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds and heavy snow with near blizzard conditions will move into the area early Monday morning and will continue into Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow in the Bendeleben Mountains.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
